s.text: He should have had the sense to call the president names in private, says the smart set.
He should have had the sense to call the president names in private, says the smart set.
But this particular proposal is a stinker, says Margaret Carlson ( Capital Gang ), because it offers parents a mere token of tax relief ($37 per year).
Who, asks clever interviewer Tim Russert, is next in line for the Oval Office?
